basis: User expresses strong agreement, concrete targets, and a plan to adapt if needed, indicating high likelihood of following the steps tonight.
cognitive_dissonance: Low. User shows alignment between beliefs (BED-friendly, cue-sensitive) and planned actions and welcomes flexibility.
negative_thought_patterns: Occasional all-or-nothing tendencies may surface if cravings spike, but current framing emphasizes adjustment and self-compassion.
emotional_triggers: Cravings and cue-driven cues, environment (evening routines), and need for simple structure to manage BED.
coaching_notes: Maintain concise, concrete plans; acknowledge flexibility and self-compassion. If cravings intensify, offer brief If-Then refinements and quick check-ins to sustain momentum. Celebrate adherence to small-step approach.
